name: Wild Buffalo Simulator
description:
WILD BUFFALO SIMULATOR and ultimate fun and amazing simulator experience.
Wild Buffalo is angry and running to catch apple for his partner who is stone and need Magical Orbs. Help Buffalo Catch Orbs and Free his partner.

You need to make buffalo run faster before his power runs out. Catch apples and boost your energy. Once you have collected the magical orbs, you need to rush towards the buffalo partner so she can get free.

WOW! time is short and buffalo is getting angry. He wants you to move him fast and catch orbs for his partner.

Product of Gamebread
